hero.title: Welcome
hero.subtitle: SoulTribe.chat is a space created to help you find and connect with your soul tribe — people who resonate with your energy, your spirit, and your journey. ✨

how.title: How It Works
how.step1: Create Your Profile — enter birth date, time, and place to generate your unique soul map.
how.step2: Discover Your Matches — we highlight connections based on compatibility and resonance.
how.step3: Start the Conversation — invite matches to chat; safe and private by design.
how.step4: Meet Up (Optional) — schedule a Jitsi call or in‑person meetup with mutual consent.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.step1: Create your account — no social logins required.
getting_started.step2: Complete your profile — add birth details; approximate time is okay.
getting_started.step3: Set your availability — propose local time slots; we handle UTC.
getting_started.step5: Chat & optionally meet — keep it in‑app; schedule when ready.

features.title: Features
features.item1: Astrology‑aware matching — connect using your natal chart.
features.item2: Timezone smart scheduling — we handle UTC conversions for you.
features.item3: Direct communication via Jitsi — text/audio/video; nothing is stored or recorded on SoulTribe.chat.
features.item4: Easy link join — private Jitsi room for confirmed meetups; privacy‑friendly, no desktop install required.
features.item5: Minimalist, focused UI — designed for meaningful conversations.
features.read_more: Read the guest Jitsi quick-start guide →

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.item1: We only ask for what’s needed to enable soulful connections.
privacy.item2: Your profile details are not sold or shared with ad networks.
privacy.item3: You control who can contact you and when to disclose more.

matching.title: How Matching Works (Short Version)
matching.text: We compute key relational indicators from your chart and compare them with others to find resonance. We prioritize harmony, complementarity, and potential for growth over generic popularity metrics.

protips.title: Pro Tips
protips.item1: Add a few availability slots across different days for quicker connections.
protips.item2: Be genuine in your intro — specifics help the right people find you.
protips.item3: Consent first, always. Move at the pace that feels right.

global.title: Global Community, Local Time
global.text: Connect with like-minded souls across the globe with automatic timezone conversion.
global.auto_text: We automatically detect your timezone for seamless scheduling.
global.native_text: Chat in your preferred language with our built-in translation.
global.tz_text: No more timezone math - we handle all the conversions for you.

guestGuide.title: SoulTribe Jitsi guest quick-start
guestGuide.intro: This guide helps first-time guests join SoulTribe Jitsi rooms with confidence. Pick only the steps you need. Text, audio, and video are all optional.

prejoin.heading: Before you join

steps.options: Learn what is available. Jitsi supports text chat, audio, and video. You decide what to enable, and each channel can remain off.
steps.permissions: Grant the requested permissions. When the login page asks for access, allow your browser to use the microphone and camera so you can turn them on later.
steps.setup: Take a moment to get set up before you enter the room.

substeps.name: Name: enter how you would like to appear to other participants.
substeps.background: Background: choose blur or a virtual background if you want extra privacy.

prejoin.mic_camera_text: Use the first two buttons to toggle your mic and camera before you join.
prejoin.devices_before_arrow: Open the small arrow next to each device control
prejoin.devices_after_arrow: and select the microphone or webcam you want to use.
prejoin.audio_tip_text: A headset or headphones helps avoid echo. If you must use speakers, keep the volume low to prevent feedback.

browser.heading: Browser compatibility
browser.supported: Firefox and Chrome offer full support for audio, video, and chat.
browser.unsupported: Safari, Edge, Opera, Brave, and DuckDuckGo are not supported at this time.
browser.note: Other niche browsers have not been verified.
browser.tip1: If prompted, allow microphone and camera access from the address bar.
browser.tip2: Disable tracker blockers or add Jitsi to your allow list.
browser.tip3: Reload the tab after changing permissions so the updates take effect.

layout.heading: Room interface overview
layout.description: The main video area in the center shows everyone who currently has their camera on. Along the bottom, the control bar holds the key icons for microphone, camera, screen share, chat, participants, and other options. The panel on the right opens the participant list and any shared screens.

microphone.label: Microphone
microphone.description: Toggle your microphone and choose the device you want to use.

camera.label: Camera
camera.description: Turn your camera on or off and select the correct video source.

screen.label: Screen share
screen.description: Share your entire screen, a specific tab, or a window.

chat.label: Chat
chat.description: Open the text chat to send messages or share links.

participants.label: Participants / Invite
participants.description: See who is in the room, invite others, and admit guests who are waiting.

more.label: More options
more.description: Access security settings, device preferences, and additional tools.

hangup.label: Leave
hangup.description: End the call and exit the room.

quick.heading: Quick join link
quick.note: Test your setup or meet friendly guests. No account is required.

closing.heading: Closing note
closing.text: Enjoy connecting in the way and at the pace that works best for you.

profile.title: Your Profile

birth.instructions: Set your birth date and location to compute your radix. If you don't know the exact time, leave the time field empty and we will use a noon fallback.

profile.note: Your profile is used to personalize matches and time zone display.

radix.title: Your Radix
radix.placeholder: If you have set your birth data, your radix snapshot will appear here.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overlap_hint: Click “Propose this time” on an overlap to propose a meetup for that slot.
dashboard.active_filter_hint: Only users active in the last 30 days are shown.
dashboard.slot_help_intro: Slots are the windows of time you publish so SoulTribe can suggest meetups when someone overlaps with you.
dashboard.slot_help_step1: Add one or more slots for the days and hours you are free. The system saves them in your profile timezone and in UTC.
dashboard.slot_help_step2: When matches are fetched, we compare your slots with other members' slots to find overlapping times that are still in the future.
dashboard.slot_help_step3: Overlap chips in the Matches section show the shared window: UTC, your local time, and your match's local time.
dashboard.slot_help_step4: Click “Propose this time” on an overlap to launch the meetup flow with that slot pre-filled.
dashboard.slot_help_step5: If something changes, edit or delete the slot so we stop suggesting outdated times.
dashboard.slot_help_more: Need extra help? Open the full availability guide from the Docs menu.
